title: ISSS608-VAA
text: Welcome to ISSS608 Visual Analytics and Applications. In this website, you will find my coursework prepared for this course.

title: Hands-on Exercise 1
text:
The code chunk below uses p_load() of pacman package to check if tidyverse packages are installed in computer. If they are, then they will be launched into R.

pacman::p_load(tidyverse)





exam_data <- read_csv("data/Exam_data.csv")

title: Hands-on Exercise 1
text:
The code chunk below uses p_load() of pacman package to check if tidyverse packages are installed in computer. If they are, then they will be launched into R.

pacman::p_load(tidyverse)

title: Hands-on Exercise 1
text:
using stat_summary()

ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(y = MATHS, x= GENDER)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  stat_summary(geom = "point",       
               fun ="mean",         
               colour ="red",        
               size=4)

title: Hands-on Exercise 1
text:
using geom()

ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(y = MATHS, x= GENDER)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  geom_point(stat="summary",        
             fun="mean",           
             colour ="red",          
             size=4)

title: Hands-on Exercise 1
text:
Using default smoothing: loess

ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x= MATHS, y=ENGLISH)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(linewidth =0.5)

title: Hands-on Exercise 1
text:
Using linear model smoothing

ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x= MATHS, 
           y=ENGLISH)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method=lm, 
              size=0.5)

title: Hands-on Exercise 1
text:
Original

ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x= MATHS, y=ENGLISH)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method=lm, size=0.5)

title: Hands-on Exercise 1
text:
Change limit to x = 100, y = 100

ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x= MATHS, y=ENGLISH)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method=lm, 
              size=0.5) +  
  coord_cartesian(xlim=c(0,100),
                  ylim=c(0,100))

title: Hands-on Exercise 1
text:
theme_gray()

ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x=RACE)) +
  geom_bar() +
  coord_flip() +
  theme_gray()

title: Hands-on Exercise 1
text:
theme_classic()

ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x=RACE)) +
  geom_bar() +
  coord_flip() +
  theme_classic()

title: Hands-on Exercise 1
text:
theme_minimal()

ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x=RACE)) +
  geom_bar() +
  coord_flip() +
  theme_minimal()

title: In-Class Exercise 1
text:
In the code chunk below, p_load() of pacman package is used to load tidyverse family of packages.

pacman::p_load(tidyverse)


realis <- read_csv("data/realis2019.csv")


realis.csv <- read.csv("data/realis2019.csv")


ggplot(data = realis, 
       aes(x = `Unit Price ($ psm)`)) +
  geom_histogram()

title: In-Class Exercise 1
text:
In the code chunk below, p_load() of pacman package is used to load tidyverse family of packages.

pacman::p_load(tidyverse)


realis <- read_csv("data/realis2019.csv")


realis.csv <- read.csv("data/realis2019.csv")


ggplot(data = realis, 
       aes(x = `Unit Price ($ psm)`)) +
  geom_histogram()
